zero-shot:
Input text:"{input_text}"

---

An input text is given above. Perform zero-shot classification of the input text; Evaluate the input text and determine if it is written by a human or if it is generated by a large language model such as yourself. Respond with "Human" if you evaluate it as written by a human, or respond with "Gener" if you evaluate it as generated by a large language model. Do not respond with anything else.
few-shot:
Example 1:
Text: "{human_text_1}"
Label: Human

Example 2:
Text: "{generated_text_1}"
Label: Gener

Example 3:
Text: "{human_text_2}"
Label: Human

Example 4:

Label: Gener

Example 5:

Label: Human

Example 6:
Text: "{generated_text_3}"

---

Input text: "{input_text}"

----

Labeled examples are given above in addition to an input text. Perform few-shot classification of the input text; Evaluate the input text and determine if it is written by a human or if it is generated by a large language model. Respond with "Human" if you evaluate it as written by a human, or respond with "Gener" if you evaluate it as generated by a large language model such as yourself. Do not respond with anything else.
